attributes.action: Please Reverse permanent  promotions of DTUS Union Officials by Department of Health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned think it is disgraceful that public money has been spent on permanently promoting three Trade Union officals up to Grade 7 earning up to £58,982 when some of these annually elected union reps were previously on AO Grade equavelent starting salary - £14,826
You will see in the attached DH facilities time agreement, that such permanent promotions for annually elected union officers is not allowed 
 rule 11. 'Once Trade Unions Side Officers are elected to a particular post, the Trade Union Side may, if they consider it appropriate, submit a business case asking the Corporate Development Team to review the post and they may consider a temporary upward adjustment to the elected officers' pay.'

These 'permanent' promotions do not appear to comply with the rules and may be untra vires please ensure that when these officers lose their next election that they return to jobs in the department on their original grades and do not continue to collect huge  salaries that most civil servants and union members can only dream of and tax payers will undoubtedly be disgusted about.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
